title: Aromatherapy
author: - Valerie P
description: Therapeutic Aromatherapy from Massage Heights® enhances massage treatments and delivers a number of wellness benefits. Learn more about our proprietary blends or visit our Retreat to experience them in person.
cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Therapeutic Blends to Promote Wellness Essential oils not only smell lovely but have also been shown to deliver a large number of wellness benefits for both your mind and body. At Massage Heights, we've created a range of proprietary aromatherapy blends to enhance your massage or skin therapy sessions and support your treatment goals. Whether you're looking to ease stress, boost energy, improve sleep, clear your sinuses, or relieve a headache, your therapist can recommend the perfect aromatherapy to complement your treatment.
